name: R4B-Condition-R5-Condition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Condition into FHIR R5

element.display: Detailed information about conditions, problems or diagnoses

target.display: Detailed information about conditions, problems or diagnoses
target.comment: R4B `Condition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition`
R4B `Condition.abatement[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.abatement[x]`
R4B `Condition.bodySite` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.bodySite`
R4B `Condition.category` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.category` - category changed the binding strength from Extensible to Preferred

element.display: active | recurrence | relapse | inactive | remission | resolved

target.display: active | recurrence | relapse | inactive | remission | resolved | unknown
target.comment: R4B `Condition.clinicalStatus` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.clinicalStatus` - clinicalStatus made the element mandatory; clinicalStatus increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; clinicalStatus has compatible required binding for non-code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-clinical|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-clinical|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis

target.display: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis
target.comment: R4B `Condition.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.code`
R4B `Condition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.contained`

target.display: The Encounter during which this Condition was created
target.comment: R4B `Condition.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.encounter`

target.display: Supporting evidence for the verification status
target.comment: R4B `Condition.evidence` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.evidence` - evidence added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/clinical-findings; evidence has change due to type change: R4B evidence BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 evidence

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.comment: R4B `Condition.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Condition.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.id`
R4B `Condition.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Condition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.implicitRules`
R4B `Condition.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Condition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.meta`

R4B `Condition.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Condition.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Condition.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: Estimated or actual date,  date-time, or age

target.display: Estimated or actual date,  date-time, or age
target.comment: R4B `Condition.onset[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.onset[x]`
R4B `Condition.recordedDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.recordedDate`
R4B `Condition.severity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.severity`
R4B `Condition.stage` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.stage`
R4B `Condition.stage.assessment` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.stage.assessment`
R4B `Condition.stage.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.stage.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Condition.stage.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.stage.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Condition.stage.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Condition.stage.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Condition.stage.summary` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.stage.summary`
R4B `Condition.stage.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.stage.type`
R4B `Condition.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Condition.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.text`

element.display: unconfirmed | provisional | differential | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error

target.display: unconfirmed | provisional | differential | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error
target.comment: R4B `Condition.verificationStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Condition.verificationStatus` - verificationStatus has compatible required binding for non-code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-ver-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-ver-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
